Meet your new Fitness and Bodybuilding Club

You will enjoy the best facilities and high-end equipment.

Meet your new Fitness and Bodybuilding Club

You will enjoy the best facilities and high-end equipment.

Meet your new Fitness and Bodybuilding Club

You will enjoy the best facilities and high-end equipment.

B_system GYM Madrid, your fitness and bodybuilding space

B_system Madrid was born in 2018 with the aim of becoming your daily training and health space. You can choose to come and train in our fitness room, train in small groups in our Rebel Studio or if you prefer a more personalized training, we have a team of personal trainers who will help you achieve your health goals effective way. All this accompanied by our nutrition services, towel service, coffee and water and of course, all the care and affection that we put into our work every day.

Our main services

Bodybuilding

Learn more

Personal Trainer

Learn more

Spa

Learn more

Wellness

Learn more

Cross training

Learn more

Tracking

Learn more

Watersports

Learn more

Functional training

Learn more

You have group classes of all activities during the whole day. More than 60 weekly classes available: Cross Training, Body Pump, Body Combat, Zumba... And if one day your schedule doesn't fit, you can always opt for the LesMills virtual classes on demand on a giant screen: choose the type of training, duration and intensity.

Learn more
